name: Kommissar
description: Kommissar is a political prosecution simulator in a totalitarian regime. Keep the Independent City-State of Roulettenburg united under the regime iron fist. Watch for your fellow citizens and seize the dissidents for the glory of the fatherland.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
